summary.span: Gets or sets an algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.

span.span: Gets or sets an algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.

value.span: 对多文件程序集中的所有文件（包含程序集清单的文件除外）进行哈希处理的算法。

span.span: The algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)中 `/algid` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/algid` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseAddress { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BaseAddress : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user’s computer at run time.

span.span: Gets or sets the address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user’s computer at run time.

value.span: 运行时将加载 DLL 的地址（位于用户计算机上）。

span.span: The address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user’s computer at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定 DLL 的基址，而不是让操作系统在进程空间内重新定位 DLL，则应用程序的加载速度会更快。Applications load faster if you specify the base address of the DLLs, rather than letting the operating system relocate the DLLs in the process space. 此属性对应于中 /base [address] 选项[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the /base[address] option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ EmbedResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.EmbedResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.

span.span: Gets or sets the resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.

value.span: 要在包含程序集清单的映像中嵌入的资源。

span.span: The resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此任务将资源文件的内容复制到映像。This task copies the contents of the resource file into the image. 在此属性中设置的项可以具有可选元数据附加到这些调用`LogicalName`和`Access`。The items set in this property may have optional metadata attached to them called `LogicalName` and `Access`. `LogicalName` 元数据用于指定资源的内部标识符。The `LogicalName` metadata is used to specify the internal identifier for the resource. `Access` 元数据可以设置为 `private`，以使该资源对其他程序集不可见。The `Access` metadata can be set to `private` in order to make the resource not visible to other assemblies. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)中 `/embed[resource]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/embed[resource]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EvidenceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EvidenceFile : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.

span.span: Gets or sets the file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.

value.span: 要使用的资源名称的程序集中嵌入的文件Security.Evidence。

span.span: The file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能对常规资源使用 `Security.Evidence`。You cannot use `Security.Evidence` for regular resources. 此属性对应于`/e[vidence]`选项[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/e[vidence]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyContainer { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyContainer : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.

span.span: Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.

value.span: 保存密钥对的容器。

span.span: The container that holds a key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这样将会通过将公钥插入程序集清单来对程序集签名（为它指定一个强名称）。This will sign the assembly (give it a strong name) by inserting a public key into the assembly manifest. 然后，此任务使用私钥对最终程序集进行签名。The task will then sign the final assembly with the private key. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)中 `/keyn[ame]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/keyn[ame]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyFile : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets a file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.

value.span: 一个文件，该文件包含密钥对或只包含用于对程序集进行签名的公钥。

span.span: The file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译器在程序集清单中插入公钥，然后使用私钥对最终的程序集进行签名。The compiler inserts the public key in the assembly manifest and then signs the final assembly with the private key. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)中 `/keyf[ile]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/keyf[ile]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ LinkResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.LinkResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the resource files to link to an assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets the resource files to link to an assembly.

value.span: 要链接到程序集的资源文件。

span.span: The resource files to link to an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该资源成为程序集的组成部分，但不复制该文件。The resource becomes part of the assembly, but the file is not copied. 传递给此参数的项可能附加名为 `LogicalName``Target` 和 `Access` 的可选元数据。The items passed in to this parameter may have optional metadata attached to them called `LogicalName`, `Target`, and `Access`. `LogicalName` 元数据用于指定资源的内部标识符。The `LogicalName` metadata is used to specify the internal identifier for the resource. `Target` 元数据可以指定任务将文件复制到的路径和文件名，然后将此新文件编译到程序集。The `Target` metadata can specify the path and filename to which the task copies the file, after which it compiles this new file into the assembly. `Access` 元数据可以设置为 `private`，以使该资源对其他程序集不可见。The `Access` metadata can be set to `private` in order to make the resource not visible to other assemblies. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)中 `/link[resource]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/link[resource]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MainEntryPoint { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MainEntryPoint : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.

value.span: 完全限定的名称 (* class.method*) 要用作入口点时将模块转换为可执行文件的方法。

span.span: The fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于`/main`选项[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/main` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets a string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.

span.span: Gets or sets a string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.

value.span: 一个字符串，限制的平台上; 可以运行此代码必须为其中一个x86， Itanium， x64，或anycpu。

span.span: A string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `anycpu`。The default is `anycpu`. 此属性对应于`/platform`选项[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/platform` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ SourceModules { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.SourceModules : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the modules to be compiled into an assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets the modules to be compiled into an assembly.

value.span: 要编译到程序集中的模块。

span.span: The modules to be compiled into an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模块将在生成的程序集清单中列出，并且仍需为分布式且可用，以便加载程序集。The modules will be listed in the manifest of the resulting assembly, and will still need to distributed and available in order for the assembly to load. 传递到此参数的项可能具有名为 `Target` 的其他元数据，该元数据指定任务将文件复制到的路径和文件名，然后将此新文件编译到程序集。The items passed into this parameter may have additional metadata called `Target`, which specifies the path and filename to which the task copies the file, after which it compiles this new file into the assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)的文档。For more information, see the documentation for [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md). 此属性与不使用特定的开关而传入 Al.exe 的模块的列表。This property corresponds to the list of modules passed into Al.exe without a specific switch.

member this.TargetType : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).

span.span: Gets or sets the file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).

value.span: 输出文件的文件格式：库（代码库）、 exe （控制台应用程序），或win （基于 Windows 的应用程序）。

span.span: The file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `library`。The default is `library`. 此属性对应于`/t[arget]`选项[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/t[arget]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

member this.TemplateFile : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.

span.span: Gets or sets the assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.

value.span: 除区域性字段之外的所有程序集元数据都从其继承的程序集。

span.span: The assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的程序集必须具有强名称。The specified assembly must have a strong name. 使用 `TemplateFile` 参数创建的程序集将成为附属程序集。An assembly that you create with the `TemplateFile` parameter will be a satellite assembly. 此属性对应于`/template`选项[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/template` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的格式是 *major.minor.build.revision*。The format of the string is *major.minor.build.revision*. 默认值为 0。The default value is 0. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Al.exe（程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)中 `/v[ersion]` 选项的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the `/v[ersion]` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks .Ico 文件所需的外观，在 Windows 资源管理器中赋予输出文件。The .ico file gives the output file the desired appearance in Windows Explorer. 此属性对应于`/win32icon`选项[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。This property corresponds to the `/win32icon` option in [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md).
